name: Beyond Our Bounds: Operation Sidewinder
description:
Beyond Our Bounds: Operation Sidewinder, is a prototype speed-run puzzle game. The game aims to have a multitude of levels across many sci-fi settings with the aim of running around them and trying to find the data pads as fast as possible

This prototype features an active skybox complete with a day/night cycle and clock in the top right of the UI to track the time taken to find the datapads. The level features animated sliding doors, dynamic lighting and hand made sci-fi inspired 3D models
